quizzes.title: Sports Quiz: Nfl and Team
quizzes.description: Test your sports knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Sports, hokey, patriots. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In golf, a caddie is the person who carries a players bag.
Who was running back for the Atlanta Falcons from 2002-2007?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Warrick Dunn

questions.question: Who played quarterback for the New York Jets from 2000-2008?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chad Pennington

questions.question: In golf, this type of shot is the first shot played from a teeing ground and is usually made with a driver.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: tee shot

questions.question: What NFL teams logo is a horseshoe?
What NFL football team won the first two Super Bowls in a row?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Green Bay Packers

questions.question: This former professional ice hokey player, known as The Great One, is widely accepted as the greatest player to ever play the game of hockey.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Wayne Gretzky

questions.question: Who was the last hockey player to be cut from the 1980 USA Olympic team by coach Herb Brooks, and what college team did he play for?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ralph Cox - UNH

questions.question: The New England Patriots used to be called the San Diego Patriots.
What NFL football team has a lightening bolt logo?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: San Diego Chargers

questions.question: He played for the Boston Bruins from 1966 to 1976.  On May 10, 1970 he scored an amazing goal diving through the air after being tripped, giving Boston its first Stanley Cup in 29 years.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bobby Orr

questions.question: What NFL team went 16-0 for the 2007 season and lost to the New York Giants in the Super Bowl?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: New England Patriots

questions.question: The Miami Dolphins had the worst record in 2007.
What NFL wide receiver was drafted by the Colts in 1996?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Marvin Harrison

questions.question: What NFL football team had the second to worst record in 2007?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: St. Louis Rams

quizzes.title: Sports Quiz: City and Olympics
quizzes.description: Test your sports knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Sports, olympiad, summer. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Ice hockey was first played in the 1920 Olympics, which were held in what city?
Generally regarded as one of the greatest hockey players of all time, Gordie Howe (aka Mr. Hockey) made his NHL debut in 1976 at the age of 18.
Of the following countries, which one did NOT host both the winter and summer Olympics in the same year?
In 1970, the American city of Denver was selected to host the 1976 winter Olympics, but the Games were moved to Innsbruck instead. Why?

options.text: A massive strike by construction workers made it impossible to finish all the facilities in time.
The International Olympic Committee rescinded their decision when proof of bribery came to light.
Several countries threatened to boycott the games because of the U.S. involvement in Vietnam.
Coloradans voted not to pay the expenses associated with hosting the Olympics.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Coloradans voted not to pay the expenses associated with hosting the Olympics.

questions.question: In which city did a 2002 figure skating judging scandal result in the awarding of two Olympic gold medals?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Salt Lake City

questions.question: Where were the winter Olympics held in 1960, the first time the host country won the gold medal in ice hockey?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Squaw Valley

questions.question: What city was awarded the 1920 Olympics to honor the suffering that had been inflicted on the Belgian people during World War I?
Which city hosted the first Olympics not held in a leap year?
What was the first Asian city to host the Olympics, in 1964?
In what year did Berlin host the Olympics, allowing Germany to use the event as a Nazi propaganda tool?
Which city has been chosen to host the 2012 Olympics, thus becoming the first three-time Olympic host city?
Which city hosted the first modern Olympiad in 1896?
When were the Olympics held south of the equator?
What city hosted the first womens Olympic marathon in 1984?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Los Angeles

questions.question: No communist country has ever hosted the Olympics.

quizzes.title: Sports Quiz: City and Olympics
quizzes.description: Test your sports knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Sports, stadium, summer. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What is the real name of WWE superstar Viscera?

options.text: Three boxing judges were accused of bribery after they awarded the decision to a South Korean light middleweight who was dominated by his American opponent.
The quarters of several Austrian athletes were raided as part of a massive doping investigation.
The marathon winner was found to have run only a portion of the race, hitching a ride for several miles before returning to the course.
Eleven Israeli athletes were killed after being kidnapped by Palestinian terrorists.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Eleven Israeli athletes were killed after being kidnapped by Palestinian terrorists.

questions.question: What city hosted the Olympics in 1994, only two years after the previous games were held?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mexico City

questions.question: Which previous Olympic city hosted the equestrian events of 1956, five months before the rest of the games took place in Melbourne?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cortina DAmpezzo

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Billy White Wolf

She wanted to have a social life and move on to other endeavors.
She really wanted to dance, and take a break.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She wanted to have a social life and move on to other endeavors.
